20110107151258.000|20110107151301.000|CC1|>> AND FINALLY, NOW, A 1945

20110107151303.000|20110107151305.000|CC1|THAT'S THE "USS KITTY WAKE,"    
20110107151305.000|20110107151307.000|CC1|BEING SUNK IN GRAND CAYMAN.
